content.p: Assistant Professor, Dr. Yasir Hafeez joined School of Computer Science, Faculty of Science and Engineering, University of Nottingham Malaysia in August 2022 as Assistant Professor. He was previously working as Research Scientist with Centre for Intelligent Signal and Imaging Research, Institute of Health Analytics and Department of Electrical and Electronic Engineering, Universiti Teknologi PETRONAS, Malaysia. He received the B.E. degree in electronics engineering from University of Engineering and Technology, Taxila, Pakistan, and the master's degrees in robust control systems from the National University of Sciences and Technology, Islamabad, Pakistan. He was with University of Engineering & Technology Taxila, Pakistan, and Institute of Southern Punjab Multan, Pakistan in academics, prior being engaged with the Centre of Intelligent Signal and Imaging Research (CISIR), Department of Electrical and Electronics Engineering, Universiti Teknologi PETRONAS, Malaysia. He has been involved in neurosignal processing and neurofeedback stimulus content developments. Programming and Algorithm (autumn) Computability (spring) Fundamental of Info Visualization (spring) telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
